author: vmassol
msg: Improved debugging of runservertests task. Simply run Ant in debug mode (ant -debug xxx) and the task will print information. Very useful to know why the runservertests task seems to hang after starting your server ...

author: vmassol
msg: refactoring + tried to have better exception handling message when connection to the server is fine but the server still returns an error (like when you redeploy a war and it fails). I haven't tested that the new exception works or is even better as I don't know how to reproduce this behaviour ... If you have any idea or if you can try, that would be welcomed ! :-)

author: vmassol
msg: refactoring to prepare the way for support of protocols other than HTTP (JMS for example)

author: vmassol
msg: new addition to ignore (useful if you're working with Eclipse - I'm trying it now :-))
